com.solacesystems.jcsmp.protocol.smf.impl

Class GrowableByteBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solacesystems.jcsmp.protocol.smf.impl.GrowableByteBuffer

  • public class GrowableByteBuffer
extends Object
    Extends java.nio.ByteBuffer functionality to provide auto-growable buffer. Growth can be configured to a size limit if needed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GrowableByteBuffer allocate(int capacity)
      Allocates a new growable practically unlimited sized buffer.

      Allocates a new growable but limited sized buffer.

    • Method Detail

      • allocate

        public static GrowableByteBuffer allocate(int capacity)
        Allocates a new growable practically unlimited sized buffer. An internal limit is java.lang.Integer.MAX_VALUE = 2147483647 [0x7fffffff] which is the same as ByteBuffer's limit.
        Parameters:
        capacity -

        public static GrowableByteBuffer allocate(int capacity,

        Allocates a new growable but limited sized buffer.

        capacity -
        sizelimit -
